title: New wave of designer tiny houses hit the market | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The house has a garage-style door opening it to the outside as well as a built-in seating area and a room that doubles as an office and a lounge. American Tiny House , the Texas company that builds tiny homes, offers its latest masterpiece, Golden. 'The 28″ Golden Model features an inviting double paned glass entry door with built in blinds providing you beautiful views with a Southwest feel,' according to Tiny Houses Swoon . The photographs of the home were snapped by Kelly Christine . For those planning to live in Wilmington, Vermont, the Wheel Pad is an attractive option (above) Intended as a wheelchair-friendly secondary dwelling, the 200-square-footer features a ramp access (above) It also has an open living area with a bed and desk on one end and a bathroom with a composting toilet, sink, and shower on the other The Wheel Pad is available for purchase for $50,000, or for rent at $1,500 per month The home also features 'very spacious interior views with distinctive accents like the exterior herringbone make quite a statement.' 'There are also energy efficient windows to let the outdoors in.' For those planning to live in Wilmington, Vermont, the Wheel Pad is an attractive option. At $1,500 per month, it provides a wheelchair-friendly bedroom and bathroom, according to New Atlas . The Trinity tiny house (above) by Alabama Tiny Homes looks pretty typical from the outside But the interior layout probably isn't what you're used to - and in a good way Instead of a staircase that goes along the length of the dwelling, this tiny house fits one along the width, making room for a spacious living area with a lofted bed over it It almost feels like a typical full-size open-plan apartment, with a kitchen counter overlooking the living area Built by Alabama Tiny Homes, Trinity Tiny is 28 feet long, 13 feet 4 inches tall, and 8 feet 5 inches wide It has a white-on-dark wood color scheme in addition to a fireplace affixed to the wall of the living room (above) It is based on a 24-foot trailer and its total floorspace encompasses 200 square feet. It also has a main living room, a bed, a desk, and a bathroom with toilet, sink and shower. Those looking to buy it would need to hand over $50,000. Finally, there’s the Trinity Tiny. Built by Alabama Tiny Homes, Trinity Tiny is 28 feet long, 13 feet 4 inches tall, and 8 feet 5 inches wide, according to Tiny House Talk . It has a white-on-dark wood color scheme. The house even comes with a staircase that goes along the width of the house. This enables more space in the living room as well as a lofted bed over it. Read more:
